subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: After Louisville’s loss to St. John’s at Madison Square Garden, Coach Rick Pitino denied a newspaper report that he was interested in a return to the N.B.A. with the Nets.
snippet: After Louisville’s loss to St. John’s at Madison Square Garden, Coach Rick Pitino denied a newspaper report that he was interested in a return to the N.B.A. with the Nets.
